"・<%MainPaletteC> or \"Dance\" after a normal attack

"By learning the Class Skill \"Partizan Gear\", you can further increase the performance of your Partizan.

Gear is filled by Guarding or by the \"Dance\" after an attack, and gains one stack every time a level is filled.

When you use a Photon Art, one stacked Gear is consumed to increase the Photon Art's power and range."
